text: Old Hapoel Ground, Petah Tikva () was a football ground in Petah Tikva, at the corner of Jewish National Fund and Schapira streets. The ground was in use between 1935 and 1940,The History in Short Hapoel Petah Tikva Museum when the team moved to their new ground ==See also== *Sports in Israel ==References== Category:Defunct football venues in Israel Category:Hapoel Petah Tikva F.C. Category:Sports venues in Petah Tikva
title: Old Hapoel Ground, Petah Tikva
